channel.title: Crazyscape [LOOK NOW] AMAZING SERVER
channel.description:
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/s3mtex.gif[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/vhynab.jpg[/img]
Hey guys :D
We are a new server with everything you could desire in a RsPs.
Owner: Jay Co-owner: Martin
We have the following features: God wars - All bosses Tormented demons Summoning Barrows Pest control Pk point shop! 100's of customs! including Torva,Pernix,Virtius, Dragon armour (g) and more! stable fighting combat system Curses! including Turmoil! Classic Edgeville home! Instant Item Switching! Perfect Hybriding! ..And more!
We have 2 forums:
http://crazyscape4u.createboard.net/forum - is our newest forums http://crazyscape4u.smfforfree3.com - is our classic forums
At classic forums are like all time moderator, admin or owner at chat box!
Register to both for Up to date news!
Client download: http://uppit.com/uc6u5r8t7pf2/CrazyScape_Client_V8.6.rar only 850kb! Don't stress!
We currently have no staff spots left. So please DON'T ask.
Some screenies:
CrazyScape item switching! [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/257zi20/5]View My Video[/URL] <- click this to see switching
CrazyScape summoning [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2woklz8.jpg[/img]
Curses [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/e159qs.jpg[/img]
Skilling [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/95ww47.jpg[/img]
Teleports [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/t0oyld.jpg[/img]
Settings [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/332w8w6.jpg[/img]
Crystal key chest [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/34e7tqh.jpg[/img]
pkp shop 1 [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/166azqp.jpg[/img]
pkp shop 2 [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/t4wjea.jpg[/img]
Rs teleblock [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/sq2lmo.jpg[/img]
Skills work! [didn't get from all skills picture] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/fk5o4k.jpg[/img]
All levels working! [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/eafwvr.jpg[/img]
Webclient coming soon!
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/vhynab.jpg[/img]

item.title: Crazyscape [LOOK NOW] AMAZING SERVER

item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

This is a server development. You can’t advertise. You can show your work and progress. If you want to advertise go to the serverstatuspage.

Read full topic
